alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 3:54AM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers tapering off early this morning, with areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Grand Canyon, Jacob Lake, North Rim, Prescott, Valle and Williams. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Additional snow forecast from 3 AM Today to 5 AM Today: Doney Park 0 to 1 inches Flagstaff 0 to 1 inches Grand Canyon 0 to 1 inches Jacob Lake 0 to 1 inches North Rim 0 to 1 inches Prescott 0 to 1 inches Valle 0 to 1 inches Williams 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
